Achievements.Name: Hero of the Tribe
Achievements.Description: Complete every level in Brave- A Warrior's Tale

Achievements.Name: The journey begins
Achievements.Description: Show that you have the skills to begin your quest!

Achievements.Name: Brave
Achievements.Description: Collect your first feather, and gain the ability to use 'spirit energy'

Achievements.Name: Scout
Achievements.Description: Collect your second feather, and gain the ability to use two Spirit Charges

Achievements.Name: Hunter
Achievements.Description: Collect your third feather, and gain the ability to use three Spirit Charges

Achievements.Name: Warrior
Achievements.Description: Collect your fourth feather, and gain the ability to use four Spirit Charges

Achievements.Name: Chief
Achievements.Description: Collect your fifth feather, and gain the ability to use five Spirit Charges

Achievements.Name: Master of Lore
Achievements.Description: You have collected all of the Secret Totems!

Achievements.Name: Spirit Walker
Achievements.Description: Stabilize the portal with the power of the sacred Totems.

Achievements.Name: River Master
Achievements.Description: Your canoe took no damage at all!

Achievements.Name: Sky Lord
Achievements.Description: No one can call you just an Earth Walker now
